text: Krunoslav "Kićo" Slabinac (28 March 1944 – 13 November 2020) was a Croatian pop rock singer-songwriter and musician. He was born in Osijek, Independent State of Croatia. His career began in the 1960s. His best known work was the 1971 hit single "Tvoj dječak je tužan". He performed it at that year's Eurovision Song Contest. Slabinac died on 13 November 2020 in Zagreb from a long-illness, aged 76. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Croatian writers Category:Croatian pop singers Category:Rock singers Category:Rock musicians Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants
title: Kićo Slabinac
